scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Primarily comprises letters of appreciation and nomination letters, 1979-2018. Also includes lists of books donated to the School for Advanced Research and the Navajo National Library, as well as flyers and announcements for lectures by Adams. Except for the folders in box 5, material was arranged in this grouping and filed in this order by Adams. Folders in box 5 include the award letter for the Guggenheim Fellowship (1962); a report on the 2004 National Endowment for the Humanities (NEH) grant; a report on Adams' sabbatical in China, 1989; Sudan newspaper coverage in Arabic of the Order of the Two Niles award, 2006; and lists of Bill and Nettie Adams' library books and value, undated.
